name: Lichess / Pychess: Kaneo pieces
description: Kaneo piece set for Lichess, inspired by chess.com's Neo pieces. Chess.com's green board style is included, to use it, set the board style to 'green' on Lichess.

user.name: Ka_HU
user.about:
This website has become very slow and unusable, so check out my greasyfork profile for future userstyles/updates: 

https://greasyfork.org/en/users/680946-upkah

Also, follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/Ka_upkah

additional_info:
UPDATE 21 March 21st: dropped pychess support, because there are a lot of variants and pieces wherewith this userstyle would not work properly.

UPDATE March 20th: border color fix for some pieces; added gray board

Made by: Ka
